scripts.configure: emcmake cmake -B build && cmake -S test -B build/test
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist dist/test && cp build/w86.wasm build/w86.js ts/index.css ts/index.xhtml dist && cp build/test/fibonacci.bin -t dist/test
scripts.gh-pages: mkdir -p gh-pages && cp -r dist/w86.wasm dist/w86.js dist/index.js dist/index.css dist/index.xhtml dist/test gh-pages
